about_the_game:
RUM the Rust Utility Mod is a standalone program to run alongside Rust, it gives players up to 4 furnace timers based on optimized counts from Lewis3's Rust furnace guide. It features a node calculator for farmers to know how many nodes of each type they need to get a specific amount of one resource. An eco-raid and a raiding calculator to figure out how much boom you need based on what you're trying to raid through and how many of them you're trying to go through. A resource calculator based off of what type of boom you're trying to make and a cloth to scrap converter with more features coming soon.

*Note* I am still working on adding features so the current version is not the finished version of the software. As new features are added the pricing will stay the same.

Current Features

  • Raid Calculator
  • Eco Raid Calculator
  • Raid Boom material calculator
  • Optimal Furnace counts to maximize smelting
  • 4 Furnace Timers based off of optimal counts
  • Cloth to Scrap converter
  • Node calculator for farming requirements
  • More coming soon.

short_description: The Rust Utility Mod or RUM for short, is a tool for calculating costs for raids, materials, set timers for furnaces, and more. It has a sleek and understandable user interface and a low CPU/RAM footprint making it great for running alongside Rust.
